parsePattern

protected static java.lang.String parsePattern(java.lang.String pattern,
                                               java.lang.String deliminator,
                                               java.util.HashMap tuple)
Parses an D2R pattern. Translates the placeholders in an D2R pattern with values from the database.

Parameters:
pattern - Pattern to be translated.
tuple - Hashmap with values used for replacement.
Returns:
String with placeholders replaced.
